replies.body:
Tickets take a long time to process, sometimes days. Have patience.

Cursing, using all caps, and acting entitled does not tend to draw a positive response from Rioters. They usually ignore rudeness.

If you want help with your problem you've got to communicate respectfully. Treat others as you wish to be treated and all that.

This is good practice, and much appreciated but I also understand the frustration.  We're looking through these specific tickets individually to gather the information we need to fix this up.  If you don't receive a reply right away, it doesn't mean that we haven't gone over those logs!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

I apologize for misconstruing how you handle things. From now on I will not explicitly say that Riot ignores people, and will merely suggest that they be more polite.

Thanks for the ticket!  We're looking at all of these logs, and our network team is investigating these EU login issues.  I feel you, you just want to get in there and play a damn game.  I promise we're not just twiddling our thumbs, and I want you to go have fun.  Hang on, we'll get this figured out and I'll continue to offer updates as they come too.
